positive.review: It's catan, can't play the full game unless bought, but i bought. great because i don't have anybody irl to play with

Good times with Catan online. It’s cool that it works across different devices. There are a bunch of game modes to choose from, and the base game being free for three players is pretty sweet. The extra stuff isn’t too pricey either if you feel like adding more. Overall, just a relaxed vibe.
It is an excellent version of the real board game. I am so addicted!

This is the classic Settlers of Catan you know and love, finally in a digital format you can play anytime. The core game is all here: trading, building, and trying to get to 10 victory points before your friends (or sneaky AI).

It's a faithful adaptation with clean visuals and a functional interface. It's the best way to play Catan online without setting up a physical board. However, be prepared for a somewhat clunky menu navigation and a monetization model that requires separate purchases for almost every expansion and visual extra. The game can also feel a bit slow at times.
The game is great, it does have its bugs and downsides but there's many Catan alternatives.
Digital version of the board game. Had so much fun playing with friend online.

Reviews seem to me to be too harsh, the game is by no means bad, yes i agree they should have put a price tag on the game and let us play unlimited and put the expansions as DLC instead of advertising it as "free" which is as free as a modern mobile game.

It is also better looking than Colonist.io and unlike there, you get to keep expansions instead of paying a subscription.
This is a great game to chill for an hour. The game sounds lame but it is actually really enjoyable.

Fun game. Well made. Nice graphics.

But it doesn't let you play more than 1 game per day in single player mode vs AI. That's lame.
I wish it wasn't so buggy, and it was easier for friends to join and leave.

Cool option to have the "free game" which is basically the same layout with the option to play against 2 players. So basically you gotta buy the basic game for $5 to be able to do something in game. When playing against AI it gets stuck on their turn so you gotta exit the game losing the experience.

My friends continue to kick the ever living dog s__t out of me every time I play this game, but I still come back for more. Its like low stakes gambling when I throw my city on a 2/11/12 combo, because when it hits, it feels amazing, but when we have 78 rolls and not a single 12 is thrown... well baby thats showbiz. I have won 1 game against my friends and only like 3 against the computers on novice. I think this is a testament to how either how stupid I am or just how little I actually know about the strategies of the game. But it does rule to just be able to hop on the computer and play this with your pals no matter where they are in the world. Its like chess where its simple to learn and takes over 100 hours to master. Or more than 100 in my case. Anyways nobody will read this and thats fine, Free Palestine, Eat the Rich, and build your community by being a good neighbor. Peace.
I've been playing the game for more than 20 years and I still love it.

Si lo compras es (casi) igual de bueno que el físico
Y la verdad que con eso me basta
Probably best board game ever invented. Must teach this game to your kids, great learning experience.

Its great to play with friends but the computer players are a bit... meh. If you have a group of friends you play with - this is a fine platform for it. If you're looking for a challenging game against computer opponents you will be disappointed. Definitely a buyer beware situation but for $5 you get access to all the base game and once you learn the UI its fine. I haven't bothered trying online against randos so best of luck with that.
Great game! Fun to play with friends
Very fun to play with friends

Great classic board game, simple and wonderfull. The fact that you can try all the game modes via the tutorial for free , is fantastic for new players, and even after that you can play it to some extent for free. I am seriously considering buying the dlc's

It is an excellent version of the real board game. I am so addicted!

This is the classic Settlers of Catan you know and love, finally in a digital format you can play anytime. The core game is all here: trading, building, and trying to get to 10 victory points before your friends (or sneaky AI).

It's a faithful adaptation with clean visuals and a functional interface. It's the best way to play Catan online without setting up a physical board. However, be prepared for a somewhat clunky menu navigation and a monetization model that requires separate purchases for almost every expansion and visual extra. The game can also feel a bit slow at times.
The game is great, it does have its bugs and downsides but there's many Catan alternatives.
Digital version of the board game. Had so much fun playing with friend online.

Reviews seem to me to be too harsh, the game is by no means bad, yes i agree they should have put a price tag on the game and let us play unlimited and put the expansions as DLC instead of advertising it as "free" which is as free as a modern mobile game.

It is also better looking than Colonist.io and unlike there, you get to keep expansions instead of paying a subscription.
This is a great game to chill for an hour. The game sounds lame but it is actually really enjoyable.
The RNG is trashy and the negotiation mechanics are frustrating but overall it's a quite well made game.
Catan plays like the board ame  Fast, flexible challenges, Fun!

The game is free, so there is nothing to complain about, but it gets annoying pretty fast when you realize that you have to pay in order to enjoy it at all. Devs, please, just put a price on the game, so I know what I am paying for and what to expect. Don't try to sell me on a "free" game, that is not free at all
I've played an unhealthy amount of Catan. Digital version is super easy to use, also have it on my phone. Highly recommend.

I get hyper fixated on things, and catan has become one of them, it is a daily ritual before work, on break, and after work, i probably need help, but i did the same thing with minecraft, darkest dungeon, stardew valley, and oblivion, so as soon as i find another fix i will probably play 500 hours of that game. I love playing with actual people though, which is why this game has become my goat

Fun game. Well made. Nice graphics.

But it doesn't let you play more than 1 game per day in single player mode vs AI. That's lame.
I wish it wasn't so buggy, and it was easier for friends to join and leave.

Cool option to have the "free game" which is basically the same layout with the option to play against 2 players. So basically you gotta buy the basic game for $5 to be able to do something in game. When playing against AI it gets stuck on their turn so you gotta exit the game losing the experience.
Awesome! It doesn't beat the board game experience but it is a solid alternative for online playing.

So many bugs, I really love the game and I think it looks great. But 50% of the games I played were bugged. Disconnects which then put you in a loading screen loop. And also 1 of the first games, I just wasn't able to play each turn and it wasn't showing the dice so i never knew it was my turn. each time I just got the notification that i took too long until i got kicked.... But I was never able to play

In my experience, the AI is good (maybe experience with AI also depends on the level of difficulty it is set to?). Buying Catan versions/expansions was confusing at first, but I managed. I play only with the AI. I don't play with other people.

I regularly try to make the AI agree to my 2:1 offer, and sometimes I have success, so I don't experience the bug with AI always denying offers mentioned in other comments.

There is one bug that is slightly annoying, although not game-breaking. If the AI has a list of actions it is doing and one of them (not the last one) is requesting a trade, and you click to make your own offer when it is still doing things, the trade window is opened and immediately closed when the next AI action is done. After this window is closed in this way, the bot stops and the game does not progress.
Workaround: exit the game and load it again from the autosave. Then, wait for the bot to finish its actions and only then react to the trade offer.

My other complaint is that there are no "Starfarers" available, there is no "Dawn of Humankind" available, and there is no option to make roads removable as in some house rules. My biggest complaint about traditional Catan is that roads, unlike ships, cannot be moved or removed once they are placed, which sometimes leads to frustrating situations.

Overall, I'm happy with this game, but I would be even happier once the things I mentioned above are addressed.
Amazing variation, good chance for strategizing and as always an element of luck involved
It can be frustrating to play and yet it is still worth playing.

negative.review: This game is GOD AWFUL! It bugs CONSTANTLY! I have had hundreds of games that had to be abandoned because the AI would bug. Screw this freaking game and screw these freaking devs! Seriously, fix your fricking game!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Yeah the random number generator or whatever is totally broken. Theres an absolute bias when you're running away with the game. It's pretty tough to win when you're competing against the computer and the other players.

I played this game a couple years ago with some friends and had a blast, I've recently gotten back into catan and remembered that I had this in my steam library and decided to hop on again. Unfortunately it has severely went down hill and forcing people to pay in order to play... Only allowing users to play 1 game every 12 hours is kinda shocking and just desperate if I'm gonna be honest with you... to any catan fans I recommend colonist.io (web browser) rather than this.
Horrible AI glitches. I just had to quit a game after AI kept offering a trade. Do not recommend.
Incredibly bad setup, and way too money hungry. Your average mobile app is less money hungry than this.

This game is so simple and it crashes for me every other game. There is no way it is this hard to get something to run smoothly. The most frustrating part is that there are constant updates going out but nothing seems to change. This can be such a great game.

Not true RNG in this mess. Game tends to focus on where the robber is more than anything else.  The AI is a joke and again focuses on making things hard for the player rather than actually playing the game for themselves.

love this game but the constant disconnects of other players, slows game down to a crawl.
since last patch after 2 players quit I get booted and the game gets stuck on rejoin screen eternally...
I've played this game over the board for years, never seen a biased dice like this. Or there is rampant cheating on this game or the devs don't know how to do statistics.

My wife and I play and each paid for some upgrades.   The game has frequent freezes on the AI's turn, but we found that if one person leaves and comes back, the game continues.  Minor inconvienence as it is very fun, but dont bother playing the AI on anything but master as they are terrible.  (even master is terrible, but we have lost 1 game to them, out of about 100.)   A patch came out today saying it has improved the connection issues.  GREAT!!!   First game in, same freeze.   She leaves, and the game does not pick up like it use to.  So not only are the connection issues not fixed, the bandaid fix, no longer works.  Thanks!
Absolute SCAM make you pay $5 to play online with your friends and then once you do it doesnt work. do not download and do not waste money on this terrible game.

Honestly, a nice game, but the "randomness" of the dices seem to stack against you on a (very) regular basis (e.g. the chances of rolling  "7" at your turn while you have more than 7 cards is mind boggling, especially as I was aware of that "feature" and am always careful about it)... Extremely frustrating game...

how are you supposed to play a game with a friend, which we both own the game, but the AI will offer a trade and instantly take the offer off the board freezing the match completely unless one of us leave which there's no mid game invite. can you please update your stupid AI so it's not as incompetent at a prepubescent child

This dumb game asks you to buy a non refundable coin purchase if you want to play more than one game per day. If you play with friends, good luck on getting more than 30min of gameplay. It will log you out and you can't return to regular gameplay. Not able to finish even one round is disturbing to say the least. 
DO NOT BUY ANYTHING IN THIS GAME.

Two of four games the AI froze after unsuccessful trade attempts and ruined the game. Every little additional shit costs money that is hidden behind some ridiculous wank of a cashgrab token. On the other hand it made me hate this Catan even more than the original, didn't feel the need to punch my monitor when playing in rl.

Edit. I think the token should be called wank bugs
This game is broken full of bugs and crashes, rollbacks just name it... its disaster dont waste your time and money here!!!

[h1]Quick Review[/h1]

[b]In all honesty, I like this game.[/b]
But I wouldn’t pay much for it—maybe if it cost one euro, I’d buy it. I don’t think it’s worth paying for.

I recommend only downloading and playing the free version with friends or trying to find random people to play with.

catan is an amazing board game and i loved that it was adapted, but anytime i try to play with a friend, we need an ai to fill in and they almost always crashes the game (about 90% at this point) its very frustrating and trying to get more people to join in is difficult when i can even show them the game

This game is an absolute joke. I paid real money for the base game and the Cities & Knights expansion — and what do I get? A damn sun timer telling me to wait 12 hours before I can play again. Are you kidding me?

Whoever thought this was a good idea clearly never played their own game. I already bought your content, but you still treat me like a freeloader who needs to “wait for the sun to recharge.” It’s insulting.

The connection is unstable, the interface is clunky, and the AI is dumber than a pile of bricks. Add to that this ridiculous “Catan Sun” scam and it honestly feels like the developers are doing everything possible to ruin one of the best board games ever made.

Stop nickel-and-diming your players. When I pay for a game, I expect to play it — not to sit here waiting for a stupid timer like it’s Candy Crush.

Fix your servers, fix your monetization, and start respecting the people who actually support your game. Until then, this is a 1/10 experience.
One single player game every 12 hours for free to play? If you wanna make a game you have to pay for just do it. Don't entice people with free to play only to find out it's really pay to play

This game is GOD AWFUL! It bugs CONSTANTLY! I have had hundreds of games that had to be abandoned because the AI would bug. Screw this freaking game and screw these freaking devs! Seriously, fix your fricking game!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Very greedy pay to play scheme for something that could easily be watching an add every game. every 12 hours doesn't really even give you an understanding of the game before you want us to throw money at it
The game if fine, good implementation of the board game. But after a break my account was gone and support didn't care at all.
It's Catan but with frequent connection problems and a poor UI. This has been the case since the game launched. It's playable but not truly enjoyable.

Possibly the worst kept server in the history of multiplayer games. Colonist is a million times better even though it's free. Save your money. This game is absolute trash thanks to the laggy, bugged out servers.

I would have paid 10 dollars for the base game and been content, maybe even buying an additional expansion. Instead, I've decided to add these devs and the publisher to my personal boycott list, and I will vow to go out of my way to ensure others also avoid buying anything from them. I do not have much power in society, but I will exert real effort in my free-time to ensure these companies fail. 

DEVELOPER: Client/Frontend: Endava / Backend: SuperNimbus
PUBLISHER: USM

i really want to love the game but even after both me (US) and a UK friend bought it we cant get past the opening 2 moves then our games desync

The dice rolling in this game is a horrible flaw. The dice results at the end of the game almost never look anything like a dice rolling probability curve. In some rounds seven appear rarely, in others it seems to be all that can be rolled. The dice rolling will repeat the same number many times in a row -- almost like it is stuck. The actual board game came with number cards as an option -- it made sure that the dice probability curve was met. We never used them, but it would be  a solution to a problem which sometimes ruins the game.
lame ahh AI cant even decide what to for damn 10 minutes and it emotes as retarded. lame ahh devs

Download game.
Attempt to start a free match. 
Sorry our servers are at full capacity (after midnight btw)
Attempt to create an account to make a custom game.
Need to verify e-mail.
Sorry our servers are at full capacity (again, after midnight)
shit game everything want gold to play...and i played 3 multiplayer game same table ..and the numbers we got when rolling most of the time is 7 ...
I cant believe i paid for these expansions just for it to be much less functional than a browser version of the game for no reason. Disconnects 5/7 games you play online
i paid for the game, now i can only play once every 12 hours according to the new updates, unless i pay!
Even the main menu is a buggy mess, close to unplayable and its not even free, literally everything is monotized

Game itself is great, but game developer team is, I am sorry to say, horrible. I payed the full version of the game and even talked few friends and my girlfriend in to buying the game. We did play for a few months.. Laggy, buggy but it was working so and so. But for the last year and a half, or even longer, it is simply not working. When I log in, game tries to load last party on which it stuck, more than a year ago. My GF is stuck in the same party. I can't exit that party. Tried reinstalling, updating game, steam.. Nothing helps. So, BIG and honest DISLIKE for this game.

After many attempts with friends, I can only say that this game and its AIs are very bugged. These AIs stop playing after many minutes into a game and make the whole experience extremely frustrating. It was like that 2 years ago, last year and a week ago. I'm done, really.

This game is incredibly pay to play and plays terribly, it completely takes the fun out of Catan at all. You would be better off just waiting for Tabletop Sim to go on sale, or even play that discord activity knock-off thats somehow more fun then this.

Better yet just buy the actual boardgame.

This game is absolute trash DO NOT WASTE TIME OR ESPECIALLY MONEY on it. Constant server problems where people are always getting kicked from games, the dice randomizer is DREADFUL, and the team cares nothing about improving stability whatsoever. They are also aware that there are pedophiles lurking in the chats and DO NOTHING ABOUT IT. ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING. Stay far away.

The AI in this game are so painful to play with, they refuse every trade i make and then repeatedly request me for things i don't have or don't want. The dice rolling consistently benefits only the AI players. Just get the board game please the game is way better without the cruddy AI shutting you out.
Even if you buy it, you can't play how you want. Unless you pay even more! What a dissapointment! But if you get it to work, if the stars align, it can be fun. Because, it's Catan.
Game is awful, barely anything for free and can't even utilize in game text chat in multiplayer without jumping through hoops. Waste of time.

AIs are very buggy, they will suddenly stop doing any actions out of nowhere, sometimes at the start of the game and others near the end. Servers are always down. The game also has a lot of paywalls, which MAYBE would be worth it if this shit finally got fixed. Had to create 3 accounts already because somehow they keep corrupting or something.
Server crashes. over and over again. im about to jump

the game has a ton of connectivity issues where mid game it makes everyone say they are rejoining, but you cant proceed with game your in. I would not recommend paying for the game. until they fix the servers. i'm not playing, i wish i could refund but its a purchase within the game so rip
Server constantly disconnected. There is no rejoining. It tries, but never does. Two 3 times in a row with tons of time put into each game.
Couldnt even start a dam game because it can only be 3 player OR 5/6. sucks to suck if you want to play 4 like actual catan allows. dont waste your time or money on this

Would not let us play as a four player team. The base game says maximum of three players, so we bought the 5-6 expansion pack but it had a minimum of 5 people needed. So if you're playing with a small group of friends-FIND ANOTHER GAME. 0/10 recommend!
Terrible game. I had 1,400 gold stolen from me in-game. I made three purchases, and today I logged in and all my money was stolen.

The AI whilst seemingly improved is so bad, often won't build more than one or two things in the whole game. The lack of an option play an online game with a friend as well as other online human players is mind boggling. Basic functionality that other board games adaptions like Ticket to Ride or Lords of Waterdeep have.

The buggiest game, perhaps of all time, embroiled in controversy after controversy. Totally incompetent developer staff, long waits for patches and fixes. The fixes themselves will then break the game in other unintended ways. Support for 5-6 player games is nonexistent and the wait times are infinite so you're stuck on the smaller 3-4 player map. I don't know why it took me so long to stop playing this game.

La verdad es un ASCO la inteligencia artificial. Es lo mismo que poner un mono con una tablet. 
Sumado a que está lleno de bugs y crashea, y la interfaz es bastante pornga. La aletoriedad de los dados y las cartas que salen está totalmente rota. UN ASCO desde el día que salió y empeora en cada update. Saludos.

Have tried playing a few times with a group but each time couldn't complete as the server just kicks us and we can't complete the game. Would love to be able to play a full game but the issue is quite annoying.
Stupid game, never letting bro choose a game for me ever. I think I need new friends because not even hell would punish you by playing this fuckass game.
servers are always full and wont let you log in.  when you do get a chance it takes forever to load.  gameplay isnt user friendly.
The AI has a major issue with whenever you initiate a trade. 9/10 time the AI NEVER wants to trade with you. This inherently breaks a fundamental system of the game.

Great game, but sometimes impossible to play because of the odds. For example, when you get 15 sixes and only 2 eights, or when a two is rolled 5 times more often than a six. This brings my rating for this game down to 1/10.
We can t even play with 4 or 5 people , don t play this shit and don t buy anything on this shit game. U can play max 3 players with the game bought
fucking bad game i paid for the expansion and its just for me all of my friends need to too and without it the map doesent change and the numbers too i am soo fucking upset

bot rolls a 7 puts robber on my plot, next bot rolls the number on said plot. next bot rolls another 7 and moves the robber to another one of my plots then i proceed to roll said number. This went on for 6 of my turns never getting any resources... 10/10 would not recommend... terrible AI
Dice rolls obviously rigged with, numbers only coming up with robbers on them, AI works with each other to beat you even if your losing. Honestly makes no sense.
